title: Meet Gunjan Saxena, The 1st IAF Female Pilot To Fight In The Kargil War & Jahnvi's Inspiration
text:
Gunjan Saxena is the first female IAF pilot who fought in the Kargil war and every Indian couldn’t be more proud of her.

Twitter

She deserves all the love and respect as she bravely fought for her nation. And now a film is made on her inspiring life featuring Jahnvi Kapoor. Today is that brave girl’s birthday and everyone is wishing her all the love and happiness including Janhvi.

The actress wrote a heartfelt note for Gunjan on n her birthday sharing a beautiful picture of them, “Happy Birthday Gunjan mam! Thank you for teaching me the true meaning of bravery, the importance of working hard and sincerely and for paving the way for millions of women in our country. You’re an inspiration and a hero, without ever having tried to be. Your story has helped me believe in myself and hopefully will help others too”.

Talking about Gunjan Saxena’s bravery in Kargil war she evacuated the injured Indian Army soldiers with all the courage. Talking about it to NDTV she had once said, “I think it is the ultimate feeling that you can ever have as a helicopter pilot. That was one of our main roles there - casualty evacuation. I would say it's a very satisfying feeling when you save a life because that is what you're there for”.

Twitter

Flight Lieutenant Gunjan Saxena didn’t have a longer tenure as there were not many opportunities for women that time, but today the women are flying and Gunjan finds it extremely satisfying to see this change.

Well, we are looking forward to see her marvelous journey with her film featuring Janhvi. The first look of Janhvi as Gunjan was out a few days ago and it was received very positively. After the first look, everyone is looking forward to watch the trailer.
